mapper.insert: insert into collection (id, goods_id, is_goods, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isGoods,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, goods_id, is_goods, create_time, update_time from collection
